View Online

August at CoWork

 

🎉 Welcome to August at CoWork !

More connections, better coffee, and a few surprises this month...


📶 Wi-Fi Update

The new Wi-Fi password (valid until August 31):

August@Fast&Free!

Same fast connection, fresher security.


📆 Key Dates & Events This Month


Breakfast & Bagels

25 August 2025 - 7:30 AM

Free breakfast & the best place to meet your desk neighbor.

Register Now

Mid-Month Happy Hour

18 August 2025 - 5:30 PM

Bring a friend. First drink’s on us 🍸

Register Now

 
💡 Tip of the Month

Did you know? You can book meeting rooms in advance directly via the Slack bot or our member portal. No more “is it free?” walk-bys.


📦 Mail & Deliveries

Still waiting on something? Check the shelves near the front desk or ping us—we’ve had a few unclaimed Amazon packages.


💬 We're Listening

Got feedback or an idea? Drop it in the #suggestions channel or email us. This space is yours too.

on ecoute


Stay cool, stay connected, and don’t forget to water the office plants if you’re the last one out 🌿

— The Cowork Team

July ! 


🎉 Welcome to August at [Cowork Name]!

More connections, better coffee, and a few surprises this month...


📶 Wi-Fi Update

The new Wi-Fi password (valid until August 31):

August@Fast&Free!

Same fast connection, fresher security.


📆 Key Dates & Events This Month


Aug 7 – Breakfast & Bagels (9:00am, community kitchen)

Free breakfast & the best place to meet your desk neighbor.


Aug 15 – Mid-Month Happy Hour (5:30pm, rooftop or lounge)

Bring a friend. First drink’s on us 🍸


Aug 28 – Freelancers’ Roundtable (12:00pm, Meeting Room A)

Skill-sharing, referrals, and a few laughs.


📢 What’s New in the Space


🎧 New Quiet Pods: Two new soundproof booths installed! Great for calls or deep work. Book via the app.


🪑 Furniture Shuffle: We’ve moved a few things around—bigger lounge, comfier desks near the window.


📈 Almost Full: We’re at 92% capacity. If you’re thinking of switching to a permanent desk, now’s the time.


💡 Tip of the Month

Did you know? You can book meeting rooms in advance directly via the Slack bot or our member portal. No more “is it free?” walk-bys.


🎉 Member Spotlight

Say hi to Martine (Hot Desk 12)! She just launched a wellness podcast and always has the best desk plants. 🌱

Want to be featured? Let us know!


📦 Mail & Deliveries

Still waiting on something? Check the shelves near the front desk or ping us—we’ve had a few unclaimed Amazon packages.


💬 We're Listening

Got feedback or an idea? Drop it in the #suggestions channel or email us. This space is yours too.


Stay cool, stay connected, and don’t forget to water the office plants if you’re the last one out 🌿

— The [Cowork Name] Team



Michael Fletcher
Customer Service
